text:
Hehe,
I was making a playlist for running!

I regularly update it
to keep a fresh vibe for my runs~
I see, that's a good habit.

Running feels more exciting, and even the usual
routes look sparkly when you're filled with excitement.
It feels like the quality of the run improves~

That sounds great.
I might make a playlist for commuting too.

When you finish yours,
maybe we can exchange playlists!
